mapper.select: SELECT CR.COURSE_REGISTER_NO, CR.COURSE_REGISTER_DATE, CR.PROGRESS_RATE, CR.LAST_VIEW_TIME, CR.COMPLETION_STATUS, CR.COURSE_NO, CR.COURSE_SCORE, CR.REVIEW_CONTENT, CR.MEMBER_NO, C.COURSE_TITLE, C.TOTAL_LECTURES, /* 서브쿼리로 교사 정보 조회 */ (SELECT M2.MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER3 M2 WHERE M2.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) AS TEACHER_NAME, /* 서브쿼리로 교사의 과목 정보 조회 */ (SELECT S.TEACHER_SUBJECT_NAME FROM TEACHERS3 T JOIN SUBJECT3 S ON T.TEACHER_SUBJECT = S.TEACHER_SUBJECT WHERE T.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) AS TEACHER_SUBJECT_NAME FROM COURSE_REGISTER3 CR JOIN COURSE3 C ON CR.COURSE_NO = C.COURSE_NO WHERE CR.COMPLETION_STATUS = 0 AND CR.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
